Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the plan.

HealthChecksForPlan.description: Represents a Region switch plan. A plan defines the steps required to shift traffic from one AWS Region to another.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

RegionAndRoutingControls.description: The Region and ARC routing controls for the configuration.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

ArcRoutingControlConfiguration.description: Configuration for ARC routing controls used in a Region switch plan. Routing controls are simple on/off switches that you can use to shift traffic away from an impaired Region.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EC2 Auto Scaling group.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

Asg.description: Configuration for an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group used in a Region switch plan.

AlarmType.description: The alarm type for an associated alarm. An associated CloudWatch alarm can be an application health alarm or a trigger alarm.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

ResourceIdentifier.description: The resource identifier for alarms that you associate with a plan.

AssociatedAlarm.description: An Amazon CloudWatch alarm associated with a Region switch plan. These alarms can be used to trigger automatic execution of the plan.

Lambdas.description: The AWS Lambda functions for the execution block.

RegionToRun.description: The AWS Region for the function to run in.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

CustomActionLambdaConfiguration.description: Configuration for AWS Lambda functions that perform custom actions during a Region switch.

Asgs.description: The EC2 Auto Scaling groups for the configuration.

CapacityMonitoringApproach.description: The monitoring approach that you specify EC2 Auto Scaling groups for the configuration.

TargetPercent.description: The target percentage that you specify for EC2 Auto Scaling groups.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

Ec2AsgCapacityIncreaseConfiguration.description: Configuration for increasing the capacity of Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling groups during a Region switch.

MinimumSuccessPercentage.description: The minimum success percentage that you specify for EC2 Auto Scaling groups.

Ec2Ungraceful.description: Configuration for handling failures when performing operations on EC2 resources.

CapacityMonitoringApproach.description: The monitoring approach specified for the configuration, for example, `Most_Recent` .

Services.description: The services specified for the configuration.

TargetPercent.description: The target percentage specified for the configuration.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

EcsCapacityIncreaseConfiguration.description: The configuration for an AWS ECS capacity increase.

MinimumSuccessPercentage.description: The minimum success percentage specified for the configuration.

ClusterArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS EKS cluster.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

EksCluster.description: The AWS EKS cluster execution block configuration.

CapacityMonitoringApproach.description: The monitoring approach for the configuration, that is, whether it was sampled in the last 24 hours or autoscaled in the last 24 hours.

KubernetesResourceType.description: The Kubernetes resource type for the configuration.

ScalingResources.description: The scaling resources for the configuration.

TargetPercent.description: The target percentage for the configuration.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

EksResourceScalingConfiguration.description: The AWS EKS resource scaling configuration.

MinimumSuccessPercentage.description: The minimum success percentage for the configuration.

EksResourceScalingUngraceful.description: The ungraceful settings for AWS EKS resource scaling.

ApprovalRole.description: The IAM approval role for the configuration.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

ExecutionApprovalConfiguration.description: Configuration for approval steps in a Region switch plan execution. Approval steps require manual intervention before the execution can proceed.

ExecutionBlockConfiguration.description: Execution block configurations for a workflow in a Region switch plan. An execution block represents a specific type of action to perform during a Region switch.

Behavior.description: The behavior for a global database, that is, only allow switchover or also allow failover.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

DatabaseClusterArns.description: The database cluster Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) for a global database.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

GlobalClusterIdentifier.description: The global cluster identifier for a global database.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The timeout value specified for the configuration.

GlobalAuroraConfiguration.description: Configuration for Amazon Aurora global databases used in a Region switch plan.

GlobalAuroraUngraceful.description: Configuration for handling failures when performing operations on Aurora global databases.

ApiVersion.description: The API version type for the Kubernetes resource.

Kind.description: The kind for the Kubernetes resource.

KubernetesResourceType.description: Defines the type of Kubernetes resource to scale in an Amazon EKS cluster.

HpaName.description: The hpaname for the Kubernetes resource.

Name.description: The name for the Kubernetes resource.

Namespace.description: The namespace for the Kubernetes resource.

KubernetesScalingResource.description: Defines a Kubernetes resource to scale in an Amazon EKS cluster.

Behavior.description: The ungraceful behavior for a Lambda function, which must be set to `skip` .

LambdaUngraceful.description: Configuration for handling failures when invoking Lambda functions.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

Lambdas.description: Configuration for AWS Lambda functions used in a Region switch plan.

Steps.description: The steps for a parallel execution block.

ParallelExecutionBlockConfiguration.description: Configuration for steps that should be executed in parallel during a Region switch.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the plan configuration.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

RegionSwitchPlanConfiguration.description: Configuration for nested Region switch plans. This allows one Region switch plan to trigger another plan as part of its execution.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for the configuration.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the configuration.

HostedZoneId.description: The Amazon Route 53 health check configuration hosted zone ID.

RecordName.description: The Amazon Route 53 health check configuration record name.

RecordSets.description: The Amazon Route 53 health check configuration record sets.

TimeoutMinutes.description: The Amazon Route 53 health check configuration time out (in minutes).

Route53HealthCheckConfiguration.description: The Amazon Route 53 health check configuration.

RecordSetIdentifier.description: The Amazon Route 53 record set identifier.

Region.description: The Amazon Route 53 record set Region.

ClusterArn.description: The cluster Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a service.

CrossAccountRole.description: The cross account role for a service.

ExternalId.description: The external ID (secret key) for the service.

ServiceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a service.

Service.description: The service for a cross account role.

Description.description: The description of a step in a workflow.

ExecutionBlockConfiguration.description: The configuration for an execution block in a workflow.

ExecutionBlockType.description: The type of an execution block in a workflow.

Name.description: The name of a step in a workflow.

Step.description: Represents a step in a Region switch plan workflow. Each step performs a specific action during the Region switch process.

Action.description: The action to perform when the trigger fires. Valid values include ACTIVATE and DEACTIVATE.

Conditions.description: The conditions that must be met for the trigger to fire.

MinDelayMinutesBetweenExecutions.description: The minimum time, in minutes, that must elapse between automatic executions of the plan.

TargetRegion.description: The AWS Region for a trigger.

Trigger.description: Defines a condition that can automatically trigger the execution of a Region switch plan.

AssociatedAlarmName.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm associated with the condition.

Condition.description: The condition that must be met. Valid values include ALARM and OK.

TriggerCondition.description: Defines a condition that must be met for a trigger to fire.

Steps.description: The steps that make up the workflow.

WorkflowTargetAction.description: The action that the workflow performs. Valid values include ACTIVATE and DEACTIVATE.

WorkflowTargetRegion.description: The AWS Region that the workflow targets.

Workflow.description: Represents a workflow in a Region switch plan. A workflow defines a sequence of steps to execute during a Region switch.

description: Represents a Region switch plan. A plan defines the steps required to shift traffic from one AWS Region to another.

AssociatedAlarms.description: The associated application health alarms for a plan.

ExecutionRole.description: The execution role for a plan.

PrimaryRegion.description: The primary Region for a plan.

RecoveryApproach.description: The recovery approach for a Region switch plan, which can be active/active (activeActive) or active/passive (activePassive).

RecoveryTimeObjectiveMinutes.description: The recovery time objective for a plan.

Regions.description: The AWS Regions for a plan.
